other_tests.findings: Random cortisol was very low (<17 nmol/L; normal 9 am cortisol 160â€“550 nmol/L), peaking at 19 nmol/L post-ACTH (normal >550 nmol/L).
No evidence of infection in CSF.
Generalised cerebral oedema and obliteration of the suprasellar cistern suggestive of uncal herniation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Cerebral oedema had resolved on CT scan after 48 hours.

other_tests.procedure_name: Follow-up CT scan of the brain
